snippet: An American diplomat apologized for the alleged rape of an South Korean woman by an American soldier, as the U.S. military imposed a monthlong late-night curfew on its soldiers there.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: An American diplomat apologized for the alleged rape of an South Korean woman by an American soldier, as the U.S. military imposed a monthlong late-night curfew on its soldiers there.

headline.main: In South Korea, American Official Apologizes Over Rape Case
headline.print_headline: South Korea: American Official Apologizes for Rape
